item.title: Due Dilligence – from an investor/acquirer perspective
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Mike Dunn – Vice President, Hearst Interactive Media [former CTO of Time Warner and Dell] – has a great series of posts on due dilligence. Check out the summary post … some great pointers on what’s required for companies who have to go through this process. Had the pleasure of meeting Mike a few years [...]
item.content:encoded:
Mike Dunn – Vice President, Hearst Interactive Media [former CTO of Time Warner and Dell] – has a great series of posts on due dilligence.

Check out the summary post … some great pointers on what’s required for companies who have to go through this process.

Had the pleasure of meeting Mike a few years ago – hopefully we can get him over to Ireland sometime soon.
